Class GenerateEmotionalMaps

  • Object
    • GenerateEmotionalMaps

  • public class GenerateEmotionalMaps
extends Object
    Author:
    Stefano Cascavilla

    It describes the class that contains the methods needed to create the emotional maps

      static void generateFilteredEmotionalMaps(ArrayList<Event> eventsList, ArrayList<PointOfInterest> pointsOfInterest, Date firstLimit, Date secondLimit)
      It creates the filtered emotional map (it checks that event is related to an active user and it checks that the event has been made between the two argument dates)
      static void generateFullEmotionalMaps(ArrayList<Event> eventsList, ArrayList<PointOfInterest> pointsOfInterest, Date firstLimit, Date secondLimit)
      It creates the generic emotional map (no checks active users, only dates)

    • Method Detail

      • generateFullEmotionalMaps

        public static void generateFullEmotionalMaps(ArrayList<Event> eventsList,
                                             ArrayList<PointOfInterest> pointsOfInterest,
                                             Date firstLimit,
                                             Date secondLimit)
        It creates the generic emotional map (no checks active users, only dates)
        Parameters:
        eventsList - It is the list (described by an ArrayList) which contains all the events read from the file
        pointsOfInterest - It is the array which contains all the POI read from the file
        firstLimit - It is the the first date limit
        secondLimit - It is the second date limit

      • generateFilteredEmotionalMaps

        public static void generateFilteredEmotionalMaps(ArrayList<Event> eventsList,
                                                 ArrayList<PointOfInterest> pointsOfInterest,
                                                 Date firstLimit,
                                                 Date secondLimit)
        It creates the filtered emotional map (it checks that event is related to an active user and it checks that the event has been made between the two argument dates)
        Parameters:
        eventsList - It is the list (described by an ArrayList) which contains all the events read from the file
        pointsOfInterest - It is the array which contains all the POI read from the file
        firstLimit - It is the the first date limit
        secondLimit - It is the second date limit

      • filterDates

        private static ArrayList<Event> filterDates(ArrayList<Event> eventsList,
                                            Date firstLimit,
                                            Date secondLimit)
        Parameters:
        eventsList - It is the list (described by an ArrayList) which contains all the events read from the file
        firstLimit - It is the the first date limit
        secondLimit - It is the second date limit
        Returns:
        It filters the events and returns only those which have been made between two dates

      • filterActiveUsers

        private static ArrayList<Event> filterActiveUsers(ArrayList<Event> eventsList)
        Parameters:
        eventsList - It is the list (described by an ArrayList) which contains all the events read from the file
        Returns:
        It filters the events and returns onlu those which have been made by active users

      • findSmallestIndex

        private static int findSmallestIndex(double[] distances)
        Parameters:
        distances - It is the array that contains distances that will be compared by this method
        Returns:
        It returns the index of the smallest value into the array

      • printSinglePOILine

        private static void printSinglePOILine(PointOfInterest singlePOI,
                                       int totalEvents)
        It prints a single line of the emotional maps. Example: POI1 - 67% A, 33% F, 0% S, 0% T, 0% N
        Parameters:
        singlePOI - It is the single point of interest the function is printing the info about
        totalEvents - It is the number of total events related to the singlePOI
